We designed our infrastructure to ensure.message: We designed our infrastructure to ensure compliant BibTeX delivery. We support all official entry and field types, which can be easily entered or imported with one click using our browser plugin: no tedious usage of converters or manual handling. Your project is always kept up to date for Overleaf and in a fashion that LaTeX will support.

Bigger teams working on a single project.message: Bigger teams working on a single project can quickly run into confusion and frustration when manually updating references in BibTeX databases (.bib-file) and mistakes can quickly occur. With CiteDrive, you can easily add references with one click thanks to the browser extension and group the references orderly simply by dragging and dropping.

We know how essential teamwork is for sc.message: We know how essential teamwork is for scientists. Comprehensive tools for teams have become commonplace, and most importantly, papers are rarely written alone. We have therefore built our platform for collaboration. Add colleagues to your project at any time. You and your team collect, structure, and annotate references and material for your work, clearly organized in one project.

A mighty pairing for LaTeX users.message: A mighty pairing for LaTeX users

Complete your research pipeline with the.message: Complete your research pipeline with the powerful one-two combination of Overleaf and CiteDrive. Connect your project across both apps and your Overleaf paper will automatically receive updates from your BibTeX file with just a few clicks.

Overleaf enables teams of students and r.message: Overleaf enables teams of students and researchers to write papers simultaneously, from anywhere, in an easy-to-use, collaborative online LaTeX editor. Overleaf supports a variety of packages, including BibTeX, where you can manage your references. When you connect Overleaf to CiteDrive, you can automatically synchronize your project and BibTeX-database with Overleaf.

Create a paper in Overleaf and ensure yo.message: Create a paper in Overleaf and ensure you’ve prepared the paper to use BibTeX citations:

Ensure you include apacite or a similar.message: Ensure you include apacite or a similar package

Include a \\bibliography tag before the.message: Include a \bibliography tag before the documentend

Create an Overleaf project within CiteDr.message: Create an Overleaf project within CiteDrive

Begin collecting references by using the.message: Begin collecting references by using the CiteDrive Companion browser add-on:

You may also add references by using the.message: You may also add references by using the built-in article or ISBN search within the CiteDrive app

Click Export on the top of the page and.message: Click Export on the top of the page and copy the unique URL of the newly opened tab

Within your Overleaf project, click the.message: Within your Overleaf project, click the Upload icon on the left-hand pane

Select External URL and paste the unique.message: Select External URL and paste the unique link into the top field. Name the file references.bib or similar. Click Ok.

Ensure you have a bilbiography added to.message: Ensure you have a bilbiography added to your Overleaf document Instructions may be found here:

With the CiteDrive Companion add-on inst.message: With the CiteDrive Companion add-on installed, click the Insert Citation button at the top of the Overleaf screen.

Select one or more references of interes.message: Select one or more references of interest by clicking on them.

Click the \"In-text citation\" button to.message: Click the "In-text citation" button to generate and insert a citation at your current cursor position within the editor.

Regenerate your paper output to see the.message: Regenerate your paper output to see the results.*

* If you add new references after first.message: * If you add new references after first linking your projects using the unique link, you will need to select references.bib from the left-hand pane and click Refresh in order for the latest version to be retrieved and new entries to show up in your rendered paper.

We would love to hear what you think! Se.message: We would love to hear what you think! Send us an email at the following address:

Overleaf + CiteDrive - A mighty pairing.message: Overleaf + CiteDrive - A mighty pairing for LaTeX users

CiteDrive is a cloud-first reference and.message: CiteDrive is a cloud-first reference and citation management platform for Overleaf.
